Title: Provides line of duty sick leave for first responders who are diagnosed with or display symptoms of a pandemic virus
Summary: Provides line of duty sick leave for first responders who are diagnosed with or display symptoms of a pandemic virus.
LawCode: Add ยง92-e, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to line of duty sick leave for first responders due to a pandemic virus
